messages.message:
Question about the `RunOCRResp` object in the OCR service:
 - looks `RunOCRResp.ib_page_json["words"][0]` corresponds to an ordered dump of all the text found on the OCRâ€™d page with the other elements of `ib_page_json["words"]` being specific words found (along with position information, size, etc.). Can someone confirm this?

next step is to lineify them: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/shared-utils/py-utils/ocr-server-lib/src/py/instabase/ocr/server/libs/ocr_parse.py#L553 such that we have an ordered list of lines and words that appear on that line (such that we can print it out into a text blob for Refiner)
